name: Jackimaniacs Racing
description:
The Second in the Jackimaniacs line up of games. After seeing how much y'all loved Fighting Jam, I decided to follow up to that game with a sequel of sorts, featuring 15 playable characters, 6 tracks and many items to spice things up.

Note: The engine used to make this game is SuperTuxKart. I do not own the engine nor do I own SuperTuxKart in general. This is all for fair use. I also don't own Ryan Louch & Charlie Murdoch from Kingfisher School. Again, this is all for fair use.
